casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gregory Wayne BAGLEY. No. 583P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*815The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of November 2006 by Defendant to Certify Complete Hearing Record from Trial Court and NC Court of Appeals:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
